title: How to Make Turkey Curry

steps.headline: Cook the onions.
steps.description: Heat an oiled saucepan over a high heat. Add the onions and cook them until they turn brown.

steps.headline: Add the spices.
steps.description: Add the garlic, ginger, coriander, cumin, turmeric, cinnamon, cardamom pods, and paprika into the pan. Stir everything together and be careful so that nothing burns.

steps.headline: Add the turkey, water, and yogurt.
steps.description: Place the mixture on a simmer and season with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.headline: Add the spinach to the pan and wait until it wilts.
Serve.
steps.description: Remove the curry from the heat and serve.

text: Cook the onions. Heat an oiled saucepan over a high heat. Add the onions and cook them until they turn brown. Add the spices. Add the garlic, ginger, coriander, cumin, turmeric, cinnamon, cardamom pods, and paprika into the pan. Stir everything together and be careful so that nothing burns. Add the turkey, water, and yogurt. Place the mixture on a simmer and season with salt and pepper to taste. Add the spinach to the pan and wait until it wilts.  Serve. Remove the curry from the heat and serve.
